select * from article where
id = (#{id}) and
title ilike #{title} and
name ilike #{name} and
status ilike #{status} and
description ilike #{description} and
content ilike #{content} and
tags ilike #{tags} and
status ilike #{status} and
authorId in #{authorId} and
(title ilike #{q} or status ilike #{q}) and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select r.*
, case when u.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from articlerate r
left join articleratereaction u on u.id = r.id and u.author = r.author and u.userId = #{userId}
where
r.id = #{id} and
r.author = #{author} and
r.rate = #{rate} and
r.time >= #{time} and
r.review ilike #{review} and
r.usefulCount >= (#{usefulCount}) and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select * from articleratecomment where
commentId = #{commentId} and
id = #{id} and
author = #{author} and
userId = #{userId} and
comment ilike #{comment} and
time >= #{time} and
updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
histories in #{histories} and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}

select a.*, b.replycount, b.usefulcount, c.username, c.imageurl
, case when u.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from articlecommentthread a left join articlecommentthreadinfo b on a.commentId = b.commentid left join users c on c.id = a.author left join articlecommentthreadreaction d on a.commentId = d.id where
a.commentId = #{commentId} and
a.id = #{id} and
a.author = #{author} and
a.userId = #{userId}
a.time >= #{time} and
a.updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
a.histories in #{histories} and
1 = 1
order by ${sort}
